message: Let's start fair. I propose a 50/50 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is still quite fair.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 55/45 split is more equitable, considering inflation is now affecting your share.
Considering inflation, I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer.
I'm willing to concede a bit more, but 48/52 is my final offer.  Any further concessions would be unfair to me.
